          <title>
            <string language="en">Distribution of energy sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteilung der Energiequellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution des sources d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição de fontes de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione delle sorgenti di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή των πηγών ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución de las fuentes de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This pie chart shows the distribution of fuels and non-fuel energy sources used to generate electricity for the whole world.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">generator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moving water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Kreisdiagramm zeigt die Verteilung der 
Kraftstoffe und der nicht für Kraftstoff Energiequellen, die 
verwendet werden, um Elektrizität für die ganze Welt festzulegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme circulaire circulaire montre la 
distribution des carburants et des sources d'énergie non-combustibles
employés pour produire de l'électricité pour le monde entier.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de torta mostra a distribuição dos 
combustíveis e das fontes de energia non-fuel usados gerar a 
eletricidade para o mundo inteiro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a torta mostra la distribuzione 
dei combustibili e delle sorgenti di energia non combustibili usati 
per generare l'elettricità per il mondo intero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα πιτών εμφανίζει τη διανομή των 
καυσίμων και των non-fuel πηγών ενέργειας που χρησιμοποιούνται 
για να παραγάγουν την ηλεκτρική ενέργεια για ολόκληρο τον κόσμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de empanada muestra la distribución de
los combustibles y de las fuentes de energía non-fuel usados para 
generar la electricidad para el mundo entero.</string>
          </description>
